name: Ross Cooper

roles_in_work.title: Jacka V.C.: a film by Nigel Buesst and Ross Cooper

biography:
Ross Cooper is a multidisciplinary designer and artist, whose works have been exhibited at SIGGRAPH, Los Angeles; Ars Electronica, Linz; The Design Museum, London; and the National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts, Taiwan.  Cooper is an associate lecturer at Central Saint Martins, University of the Arts where he teaches graphic design.  His areas of interest include complex information visualisation, wearable electronics and time.

(SW 29.3.2005)
